MrAssassn - I use Ripbot264 to compress HD content.  It creates an MKV so I use tsMuxerGUI to quickly repackage it into m2ts.
By the way, you can use options in tsMuxer to create multiple files of 4BG - I compress down to 10-12 GB (in RipBot264) then split that into 4GB files for the PS3 to play.  the PS3 has an option called 'Sequential Playback' that makes this work seamlessly.

Suggested subs for this up?

Thanks brick
